effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 774,599 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 327,449.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,490, up to 12,453.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.7 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
